name: Run Santa run!
description:
Run Santa run - by BigBuckBunny

A Christmas game made in 4 days

Controls:

- AWSD or arrow keys to move

- left mouse click to interact with buttons

- right mouse click to select the character.

The goal is to jump the snowballs and collect presents to buy new characters! Good luck and have fun :D

- - Credits --

-Art and coding by me

-Music by Dual Orsa's Orchestra

-Made with Construct 2

Special thanks to Samuele Sciacca  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmJRy12e_qIPCnWnf6jk7DQ

Special thanks to SviluppareGiochi.it
